description: Advanced Program of Agile Project Management, SCRUM in Educatic
Revit API with C#. Nivel 1 in BM learning hub
Revit API with C#. Nivel 2 in BM learning hub
Revit API with C#. Nivel 3 in BM learning hub
Project Manager & Software developer at BIM consulting company, Voyansi
more: At Voyansi, I am a member of the Software team where we develop software and automations for the AECO industry. I have a hybrid profile, engaging in daily project management, participating in discovery meetings, and meeting with customers. Additionally, I make software development contributions to various projects.
I have carried out different types of training, individual and for groups of 25 people with a duration of 100 hours through Barcelona Activa, among other companies.

Gaptek is a modular architecture company, which develops and produces buildings with its own aluminum structure and design. I have participated in various projects such as the 32,000m2 cargo building for Turkish Airlines at Istanbul Turkey airport, a 15,000m2 modular cover for the unloading of coal, in the Astafiev terminal in Russia, expansion of the emergency room at Granollers Hospital to support pandemic situation due to Covid. Support for various projects Hangar-type  and offices with a modular structure. My work at Gaptek has evolved providing me to grow professionally with a focus on technology. I have enriched my knowledge in Autodesk Revit in raising three-dimensional and informed Models, going through the creation of Families with the rigor of production. The information management of the model, managing it from the creation of the family to the insertion in the model and subsequent measurement and production. The need to accurately account for each element of the model for subsequent production, purchase and assembly has allowed me to work with Dynamo and Excel for the information management of the Bim Model and Navisworks for the control of design and assembly errors. The diversity of projects developed by Gaptek has also allowed me to coordinate BIM models and adapt templates and develop Dynamo routines for correct modeling and subsequent parameter management. In addition to Revit, Dynamo and Navisworks I have had the opportunity to use tools such as Presto and Cost it for extraction of measurements.
